channel.title: Error when running client
channel.description:
Hello.
When i try to run my client a black box appears straight away and i get a error which says [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Before you ask i've got all my java all i need.. and my server is online but im tryin to get online thru the client, and i get that error.
Help me please much appriciated.
Thanks.

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You’re missing a class. The client isn’t your; it can’t be, or you wouldn’t have deleted one of your own files.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

well one of my other clients work… but because it hasnt got all i files i cant edit it with my server and its got the same run thing inside

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[b]NoClassDefFoundError: Gui[/b]
It cannot find the class file named 'Gui', if you have a .java file called 'Gui' then you'll need to compile, or edit the batch file to look for the main class file if it isn't Gui.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

For one, the black box is a command prompt window…

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

How do i get a “Gui” class?

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

It’s missing the ‘Gui’ class.

Read full topic
